lyric:
[00:13.920]One year like any old other year
[00:18.050]In a week like any week
[00:21.810]Monday lying down
[00:25.210]Half Asleep
[00:27.750]People doing what people do
[00:31.520]Loving, working and getting through
[00:34.950]No portraits on the walls
[00:37.840]Of Seventh Avenue
[00:40.720]Then Tuesday came and went
[00:43.590]Like a helicopter overhead
[00:47.430]The Letter that she left
[00:50.740]Cold Addressed in Red
[00:54.140]Tuesday Came and went
[00:56.900]One one September when
[01:00.980]will she come again
[01:05.500]
[01:18.160]The thing about memories
[01:21.450]They're sure and bound to fade
[01:24.790]Except for the stolen souls
[01:28.590]Left upon her blade
[01:31.750]Is Monday coming back
[01:35.560]That's what Mondays do
[01:38.860]They Turn and Turn around
[01:42.500]Afraid to see it through
[01:45.590]Tuesday came and went
[01:48.190]Like a helicopter overhead
[01:52.420]The Letter that she left
[01:55.670]Cold Addressed in Red
[01:58.750]Tuesday Came and went one
[02:02.310]One September
[02:04.300]When will she come again
[02:10.890]
[02:40.370]Tuesday Came and went one
[02:43.540]One September, When?
[02:46.950]Cold and dressed in red
[02:50.270]How could I forget
[02:54.190]Tuesday Came and went
[02:56.920]Like a Helicopter overhead
[03:01.080]Will she come again
tlyric:
[by:微雨去尘]
[00:13.920]最是普通的一年
[00:18.050]最是普通的一周
[00:21.810]周一姗姗来迟
[00:25.210]半睡半醒之间
[00:27.750]人们各司其职
[00:31.520]相爱，工作，经历一切
[00:34.950]墙上没有涂鸦
[00:37.840]在第七大道上
[00:40.720]周二降临然后离去
[00:43.590]一如头顶直升飞机
[00:47.430]她离别时留下的那封信件
[00:50.740]被套进红色信封冷冷投递
[00:54.140]周二降临然后离去
[00:56.900]又是一个九月
[01:00.980]伊人何时归来
[01:18.160]旧事之记忆
[01:21.450]虽历历在目，却注定褪色
[01:24.790]除了那被盗走的灵魂
[01:28.590]依旧驻留在叶片之上
[01:31.750]周一是否还会回来
[01:35.560]那是它必经的归途
[01:38.860]他们原地转来转去
[01:42.500]害怕看见它的流逝
[01:45.590]周二降临然后离去
[01:48.190]一如头顶直升飞机
[01:52.420]她离别时留下的那封信件
[01:55.670]被套进红色信封冷冷投递
[01:58.750]周二降临然后离去
[02:02.310]又是一个九月
[02:04.300]伊人何时归来
[02:40.370]周二降临然后离去
[02:43.540]何时又是一个九月？
[02:46.950]被套进红色信封冷冷投递
[02:50.270]我怎么能够忘记
[02:54.190]周二降临然后离去
[02:56.920]一如头顶直升飞机
[03:01.080]她还会回来吗
